amendment.description: Amendment makes available $600,000 in National Archives and Records Administration Operating Expenses funding for the preservation of the records of the Freedmen's Bureau.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that reserves $600,000 of the bill's $250 million appropriation for the National Archives and Records Administration for the preservation of the records of the Freedmen's Bureau.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
